channel.title: Comments on: Lens: Linsanity and Linguine
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Max
item.dc:creator: Max
item.description: Soph, this was delicious storytelling. Looking forward to the next tales.
item.content:encoded: Soph, this was delicious storytelling. Looking forward to the next tales.

Thanks, Glenn! We will. :)

item.title: By: sarah
item.dc:creator: sarah
item.description: splendid!! your descriptions are very visual, i could see it happening. more, more!!
item.content:encoded: splendid!! your descriptions are very visual, i could see it happening. more, more!!

item.title: By: Glenn Kelly
item.dc:creator: Glenn Kelly
item.description: What a lovely story. I hope you'll keep up with these little vignettes. It reminds me of a cherished magazine, The Sun which we all read with relish.
item.content:encoded: What a lovely story. I hope you’ll keep up with these little vignettes. It reminds me of a cherished magazine, The Sun which we all read with relish.
